sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card
      tile
      dark
      elevation="0"
      class="full-height"
  >
    <v-img
        height="55vh"
        src="https://unsplash.com/photos/9OKGEVJiTKk/download?force=true&w=640"
    >
      <v-row fluid class="fill-height d-flex justify-center align-center">
        <v-col cols="10">

          <v-card light class="pa-8 transparent-title-color">
            <v-form
                ref="form"
                v-model="valid"
                lazy-validation
            >
              <v-text-field
                  v-model="nickname"
                  :counter="12"
                  :rules="nicknameRules"
                  label="Your nickname"
                  required
              ></v-text-field>

              <v-row>
                <v-col cols="6">
                  <v-select
                      v-model="userLimitSelect"
                      :items="userLimit"
                      :rules="[v => !!v || 'Item is required']"
                      label="Users limit"
                      required
                  ></v-select>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="3">
                  <v-checkbox
                      v-model="openToPublicBool"
                      :rules="[v => !!v || 'You must agree to continue!']"
                      label="Password protected?"
                      required
                  ></v-checkbox>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="3">
                  <v-checkbox
                      v-model="passwordBool"
                      :rules="[v => !!v || 'You must agree to continue!']"
                      label="Show in lobby explorer?"
                      required
                  ></v-checkbox>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>

            </v-form>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>

        <v-row fluid class="d-flex justify-center align-center mt-n12">
            <v-btn class="transparent-title-color" light x-large outlined elevation="8">
              <v-card-title class="full-height justify-center" primary-title>
                Create chat room
              </v-card-title>
            </v-btn>
        </v-row>

      </v-row>

    </v-img>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'CreateRoomCard',
  data: () => ({
    loading: false,
    selection: 1,
  }),

  methods: {
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.transparent-title-color {
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, .8) !important;
  border-color: white !important;
}
</style>
